thread.title_full: Online Retailer Of High - End Brand Name Youth Prod

title: Online Retailer Of High - End Brand Name Youth Prod
text: Questions Business Summary As one of the earliest ecommerce retailers to focus exclusively on the niche upscale juvenile products market, this business has been able to capitalize on some of the first mover advantages especially with regards to strong vendor relationships and domain names. Today with over a decade of experience in this niche, the company is the premier online retailer of high-end, brand name juvenile products and its vendor relationships are one of a kind with its most popular vendors having closed their business to new online merchants. Offering a broad range of products such as furniture, bedding, strollers, baby gear and toys, this business has an established history of attracting parents, grandparents and family friends to shop for infant products in this 6.2 Billion dollar industry. The company has invested heavily in ecommerce software and platforms, efficient back-end systems, product inventory and enhanced marketing campaigns. It operates multiple websites under a single technology platform to capture business in various niches of this industry and has an extensive presence on Amazon. As a result, this business continues to increase annual revenue at double digit growth rates, generate favorable returns on investment and is positioned to achieve continued strong growth into the future. This website business is an outstanding opportunity for any buyer looking to acquire a well-established, profitable, efficiently run ecommerce business in a multi-billion dollar market with still tremendous further growth potential! * Current inventory value is approximately $725,000, with an average inventory value of approximately $645,000 over the last 12 months. Financials
